resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

emkornfield commented on pull request #6186: ARROW-7567: [Java] Bump Checkstyle from 6.19 to 8.19
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6186#discussion_r367774083
 
 

 ##########
 File path: java/dev/checkstyle/checkstyle.xml
 ##########
 @@ -94,9 +81,6 @@
             <property name="tokens" value="LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_SWITCH"/>
         </module>
         <module name="NeedBraces"/>
-        <module name="LeftCurly">
-            <property name="maxLineLength" value="100"/>
 
 Review comment:
   why this removal?

Fokko commented on pull request #6186: ARROW-7567: [Java] Bump Checkstyle from 6.19 to 8.19
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6186#discussion_r367872425
 
 

 ##########
 File path: java/dev/checkstyle/checkstyle.xml
 ##########
 @@ -94,9 +81,6 @@
             <property name="tokens" value="LITERAL_TRY, LITERAL_FINALLY, LITERAL_IF, LITERAL_ELSE, LITERAL_SWITCH"/>
         </module>
         <module name="NeedBraces"/>
-        <module name="LeftCurly">
-            <property name="maxLineLength" value="100"/>
